This jacket is possibly the best thing I've bought! The quality is amazing.  I was worried it wouldn't fit cause it's a men's 2xl and I have a 49" bust,  but it's perfect.  Zips all the way,  top to bottom.  But it's INCREDIBLY soft velour!  Just as soft & snuggly as my grand-puppy, pictured snuggled in the jacket!  It's designed for a baby,  but fits a small animal too. It's my puppy pocket! It's hot weather today but we just got a new air conditioner installed,  so it's chilly in our house.  n

I absolutely love this! It looks just like pictured. I bought this as a gift for my man, but wanna keep it for myself! He wears a XL-2XL normally, but got 3XL (due to measurements.) The material isn't like regular cotton sweater material, it's a smooth polyester sublimated (absorbed in fabric) print. I love the smooth, sporty-like feel to it. This hoodie is beautifully made, but it is made for a person of a smaller build than my family has. The fabric is very soft. The wait time wasn't even too bad. When I have had a problem they have been more than happy to help me in addressing the problem. Overall I have been quite pleased with my Dresslily experience.

Good quality of print, the picture looks the same as the real thing. Sizes are smaller than usual - I have 185 cm and 82 kg and I had to order 2XL - but fits well. Expected the hoodie to be a bit thicker and made of a different kind of fabric, but anyway I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend. Came to the Netherlands from China in less than two weeks.
